title: E-Commerce Integration Apps using Next.js & Saleor GraphQL API with Lee Robinson & Patryk Zawadzki

media:group.media:title: E-Commerce Integration Apps using Next.js & Saleor GraphQL API with Lee Robinson & Patryk Zawadzki
media:group.media:description:
I'll be live building an e-commerce integration app for handling abandoned carts using Next.js and Saleor API.
